learning.supervised

Class ClassifierFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.supervised.ClassifierFactory

  • public class ClassifierFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for obtaining initial classifier instances for the specified neighborhood size, metric and number of classes in the data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClassifierFactory() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<ValidateableInterface> getAllClassifierInstances(int numCategories, CombinedMetric cmet, int k)
      This method generates a list of all possible classifiers for the given configuration parameters, which can be useful in testing.
      static java.util.ArrayList<DiscreteClassifier> getAllDiscClassifierInstances(int numCategories, CombinedMetric cmet, int k)
      This method generates a list of all possible discrete classifiers for the given configuration parameters, which can be useful in testing.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Classifier> getAllNonDiscClassifierInstances(int numCategories, CombinedMetric cmet, int k)
      This method generates a list of all possible non-discrete classifiers for the given configuration parameters, which can be useful in testing.
      ValidateableInterface getClassifierForName(java.lang.String classifierName, int numCategories, CombinedMetric cmet, int k)
      This method generates an initial classifier instance for the specified classifier name, neighborhood size, metric and number of classes.

    • Method Detail

      • getClassifierForName

        public ValidateableInterface getClassifierForName(java.lang.String classifierName,
                                         int numCategories,
                                         CombinedMetric cmet,
                                         int k)
        This method generates an initial classifier instance for the specified classifier name, neighborhood size, metric and number of classes.
        Parameters:
        classifierName - String that is the classifier name.
        numCategories - Integer that is the number of categories in the data.
        cmet - CombinedMetric object for distance calculations.
        k - Integer that is the neighborhood size.
        Returns:
        ValidateableInterface object corresponding to the parameter specification.

      • getAllClassifierInstances

        public static java.util.ArrayList<ValidateableInterface> getAllClassifierInstances(int numCategories,
                                                                   CombinedMetric cmet,
                                                                   int k)
        This method generates a list of all possible classifiers for the given configuration parameters, which can be useful in testing.
        Parameters:
        numCategories - Integer that is the number of categories in the data.
        cmet - CombinedMetric object for distance calculations.
        k - Integer that is the neighborhood size.
        Returns:
        ArrayList representing a list of classifiers corresponding to the parameter configuration.

      • getAllNonDiscClassifierInstances

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Classifier> getAllNonDiscClassifierInstances(int numCategories,
                                                               CombinedMetric cmet,
                                                               int k)
        This method generates a list of all possible non-discrete classifiers for the given configuration parameters, which can be useful in testing.
        Parameters:
        numCategories - Integer that is the number of categories in the data.
        cmet - CombinedMetric object for distance calculations.
        k - Integer that is the neighborhood size.
        Returns:
        ArrayList representing a list of classifiers corresponding to the parameter configuration.

      • getAllDiscClassifierInstances

        public static java.util.ArrayList<DiscreteClassifier> getAllDiscClassifierInstances(int numCategories,
                                                                    CombinedMetric cmet,
                                                                    int k)
        This method generates a list of all possible discrete classifiers for the given configuration parameters, which can be useful in testing.
        Parameters:
        numCategories - Integer that is the number of categories in the data.
        cmet - CombinedMetric object for distance calculations.
        k - Integer that is the neighborhood size.
        Returns:
        ArrayList representing a list of classifiers corresponding to the parameter configuration.
